parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host on which you want to delete the public key from the user.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: PublicKeyId
parameters.description: The ID of the public key.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the bastion host. For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
